summary.span: 提供标准功能，用于创建和管理 对象的已排序的类型安全集合。

span.span: Provides standard facilities for creating and managing a type-safe, ordered collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此集合支持标准的从零开始的索引。This collection supports standard zero-based indexing. 由类提供的属性 返回 。The property provided by the class returns a . 有关详细信息，请参阅 [如何：通过 Columns 属性操作表的列](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-manipulate-table-columns-through-the-columns-property)。For more information, see [How to: Manipulate a Table's Columns through the Columns Property](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-manipulate-table-columns-through-the-columns-property).

.property instance int32 Capacity
Public Property Capacity As Integer
public: property int Capacity { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.Capacity : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置为此集合预先分配的集合项容量。

span.span: Gets or sets the pre-allocated collection item capacity for this collection.

value.span: 为此集合预先分配的集合项容量。

span.span: The pre-allocated collection item capacity for this collection.
The default value is 8.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性表示预分配的槽数，用于存储此集合中的项，而 属性表示集合中当前项的实际数目。The property represents the number of pre-allocated slots for storing items in this collection, whereas the property represents the actual number of items currently in the collection. 的值 始终至少与的值相同 。The value of is always at least as large as the value of . 当新添加的集合项导致集合计数超出集合容量时，会自动增加容量以容纳新添加的集合项。When newly added collection items cause the collection count to exceed the collection capacity, the capacity is automatically increased to accommodate the newly added collection items. 增加收集容量需要分配额外的收集槽，这会产生性能和内存开销。Increasing the collection capacity involves allocating additional collection slots, which incurs both performance and memory overhead. 如果事先知道收集项的总数量或最大数量，请使用属性优化集合容量。Use the property to optimize the collection capacity in cases where the total or maximum number of collection items is known in advance. 使用 方法可使集合容量与当前的集合计数成一。Use the method to cause the collection capacity to equalized with the current collection count.

exception.span: 当尝试将 设置为小于 的当前值的值时引发。

span.span: Raised when an attempt is made to set to a value that is less than the current value of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用后 ，属性的值 将变为 **0** ，并且属性的值 将保持不变。After calling , the value of the property becomes **0** and the value of the property is unchanged. 若要设置新容量，请 通过属性调用或显式设置新容量 。To set a new capacity, call or explicitly set a new capacity through the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public void TrimToSize ();
.method public hidebysig instance void TrimToSize() cil managed
Public Sub TrimToSize ()
public: void TrimToSize();
member this.TrimToSize : unit -> unit

summary.span: 通过将基础集合 设置为等于集合中当前项的 来优化集合的内存占用。

span.span: Optimizes memory consumption for the collection by setting the underlying collection equal to the of items currently in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于最大程度地减少集合的内存开销，尤其是在集合包含的项集应为静态的情况下。This method can be used to minimize memory overhead for a collection, particularly if the set of items contained by the collection is expected to be static.
